message: Marriage the leading cause of divorce

Good actor, enjoyed his work over the years, especially in Gettysburg, but I think I most admire him for two things, he still lives in his hometown with his wife and children, so his marriage has endured as has his dedication to his community. Kinda rare these days.

Addiction is never truly a choice. It ALWAYS begins due to physical or psychological trauma that makes the victim seek any escape from unbearable pain. People in bad situations find company in misery then get into dangerous party scenes or medicate alone to escape the trauma. Then even if they get over the original trauma, they are forever left with a chemical addiction. Anyone who hasn't experienced chemical addiction can't ever understand. Your mind becomes completely hijacked. All your intelligence, skills and strength are focused into using the substance. A full-blown addict would easily sell his own children, destroy his own body or steal from his own mother because the mind is warped and justifies EVERYTHING to get the drug. The mind of a non-addict will never truly understand the disease. If you've been there, you see it is NOT A CHOICE and people have to be physically restrained by others when addiction is full blown to stop killing themselves. How is that not mental illness? And like with any mental illness, addicts are never completely healed. They have to play mental tricks to fight addiction 24/7, seek therapy, sometimes take medication and are always one weak moment away from relapse.

Dear Leftists, Liberals, and Progressives, You lost this election because you got up every day and loudly accused anyone who didn't agree with you of being a racist, misogynist, bigot, homophobic You lost because you did nothing but spew hate for 8 years while telling us yours was an ideology of love. You lost because you stole from America via taxation while telling us that we were the greedy ones. You lost because you dropped more bombs, killed more with drone strikes, and increased tensions with a nuclear superpower all while telling us that we were the war-mongers. You lost because the cities that you controlled spiraled into poverty and crime all while you told us that our policies disenfranchised people. You lost because you told us that gender is simply a social construct all while telling us that Hillary should be president because of her gender. You lost because you support and take money from regimes that imprison or kill gays, subjugate women, and think that rape is a man's right all while telling us that we hate gays, are afraid of women, and promote a culture of rape. You did not lose because we are racist. You did not lose because we are homophobic. You did not lose because we are misogynists or bigots. You lost because you are liars. You lost because you are hypocrites. You lost because you were not witty or clever enough to even hide those facts very well. Sincerely, The Rest of American News
